title: I'm a 5th-year Software Engineering student at Western University with a passion for Javascript and web development. In my free time, I'm an avid hockey player and skier
demoInto: Here's a small collection of the Projects I've worked on in the past.To check out more of them visit my Github at
sortedToDo: Using React Native and Expo I built a mobile app for keeping track of tasks. Using a screen stack the user can navigate between views of sorting tasks, adding tasks and modifing them.
arraySorting: Using react spring in a group projct for school,  I built an automated array sorting animation.
asteroids: Using unity in my second year of school I created a simple asteriods game. I exported it to webGL for use on my website.
